thread.title: Global Retail Touch Screen Display Market 2015-2019
thread.title_full: Global Retail Touch Screen Display Market 2015-2019

title: Global Retail Touch Screen Display Market 2015-2019
text:
Global Retail Touch Screen Display Market 2015-2019 [September 02, 2015] 
LONDON , Sept. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 
About Retail Touch Screen DisplayA touchscreen display includes a touch sensor, a protection layer, and other components used to detect the touch. A touchscreen is usually operated using fingers or using a stylus depending on the convenience and the type of the touchscreen. It has wide applications; most of them are used in smartphones and tablets. Apart from these, they are used in ATMs, kiosks, POP devices, retail signage, transportation, media players, laptops, and PCs. The various technologies used in the touchscreen are the following: resistive technology, projected capacitive, and infrared technology. 
Covered in this Report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global retail touchscreen display market for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers the worldwide shipment of touchscreen displays in signage and professional market in the retail industry. 
The report also presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the leading vendors in the market. 
Key Regions
